name: A thick leather collar
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has nice armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'hew'.
